tasks.title: This page can be navigated with a keyboard
tasks are also saved in localStorage
#1 - If I create the task when the server is offline, the app will remember that and update server data when page is reloaded with servers online
#2 - Now let's see what happens when new data is added before page reload, but after new task is created and server is on again
#3 - new task is added, older task is still in localstorage, not added with page reload because local and server lastUpdated are set by task#2
app can't detect difference between data in LS and server, and LS always overrides server data
#4 - multiple page reloads and #1 is still in LS only. 'checkupdates' relies on lastUpdated, so it won't help
